sentence.Network_en: To me moralistic films are just unbearable.
sentence.Network_cn: 对我来说，说教电影简直难以忍受。

sentence.Network_en: In the moralistic accents of today's leaders we hear echoes of a previous generation's hypocrisy.
sentence.Network_cn: 在当今领导人的说教腔调中,我们感到了上一代人的伪善.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(M) ... moralist 道德家 moralistic 道学的 morality play 道德剧.
词根及词缀 ... antagonistic a 敌对的 moralistic a 道学气的 hedoniatic a 享乐主义的.
SAT Official Guide V-Mate ... jocular 诙谐的, 滑稽的 moralistic 道学的, 说教的 disagreeable 令人不快的, 讨厌的.
...谈论摄影时，将道德（moral）本身，与失之偏狭的道德主义（moralistic）搅在一起，或者说，她从对摄影的道德思考，有时滑入道 …

list.abs: Cowperwood saw things in no such moralistic or altruistic light .柯帕乌却不以这种道德的，利他主义的眼光来看事情。
two persons cannot long be friends if they cannot forgive each other's little failings . -- Jean de La Bruyere , French moralist如果两个人对于彼此的小缺点不能相互原谅，他们的友谊便不能持久。法国道德家拉布吕耶尔
...道德主义谬误（moralistic fallacy），是一种非形式谬误，大意是认为「好的就是自然的」Q&A: Steven Pinker of 'Blank Slate', United Press International, 10/30/2002, http://pinker.wjh.harvard.edu/books/tbs/.
subtle cheating may involve sham moralistic aggression , sham guilt , sham sympathy , and pretense for awakening sympathy .狡猾的欺骗可能包括假装的道义攻势、假内疚、假同情以及唤醒同情心的托词。

entry.def: If you describe someone or something as moralistic, you are critical of them for making harsh judgments of other people on the basis of their own ideas about what is right and wrong.

example.ex: To me moralistic films are just unbearable.
example.tran: 对我来说，说教电影简直难以忍受。

auth_sentence.content: Straightforward and moralistic, he admitted misdeeds and avoided dissembling.
auth_sentence.res_content: Straightforward and moralistic, he admitted misdeeds and avoided dissembling.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Straightforward and moralistic, he admitted misdeeds and avoided dissembling.

auth_sentence.content: The British press was its enthusiastic moralistic self.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The British press was its enthusiastic moralistic self.

auth_sentence.content: Malawians tends to be a very moralistic culture, very conservative.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,由ist+ic构成,表示"具有……的"; 2. 表示名词"学科"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ant=anti反对+agon斗争+istic具有……的→adj.反对的,敌对的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 艺术[家]的,美术[家]的;善于艺术创作的
stems_affixes.word_buile: art技巧,艺术+istic具有……的→adj.艺术[家]的,美术[家]的;善于艺术创作的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 人文主义的,人本主义的,人道主义的
stems_affixes.word_buile: human人+istic具有……的→adj.人文主义的,人本主义的,人道主义的
stat站+istic学科+s→站着[静态]的学科→统计

sentences.en: In the moralistic accents of today’s leaders we hear echoes of a previous generation’s hypocrisy.
sentences.cn: 在当今领导人的说教腔调中,我们感到了上一代人的伪善。
